com.googlecode.sarasvati
Interface NodeToken

All Superinterfaces:
Token
All Known Implementing Classes:
HibNodeToken, MemNodeToken
public interface NodeToken
extends Token

Node tokens point to nodes in the graph. Unlike arc tokens, they may have attributes associated with them.

Author:
Paul Lorenz

Method Summary

          Returns an Iterable of attribute names.

          Gets an attribute as a boolean.

Method Detail

getNode

Node getNode()
Returns the node that this token points to.

Returns:
The node associated node.

getProcess

Process getProcess()
Returns the process that this node token belongs to.

Returns:
The associated process

getStringAttribute

String getStringAttribute(String name)
Gets an attribute as a String. If there is no value set for the attribute, null will be returned.

Parameters:
name - The name of the attribute to get
Returns:
The value of attribute or null if no value is set for the attribute.

setStringAttribute

void setStringAttribute(String name,
                        String value)
Sets the attribute of the given name to the given string value.

Parameters:
name - The name of the attribute to set.
value - The value to set the attribute to

getLongAttribute

long getLongAttribute(String name)
Gets an attribute as a long. If there is no value set for the attribute or if the attribute can not be read as a long, 0 will be returned.

Parameters:
name - The name of the attribute to get
Returns:
The value of attribute or 0 if no value is set for the attribute or the value cannot be interpreted as a long

setLongAttribute

void setLongAttribute(String name,
                      long value)
Sets the attribute of the given name to the given long value.

Parameters:
name - The name of the attribute to set.
value - The value to set the attribute to

getBooleanAttribute

boolean getBooleanAttribute(String name)
Gets an attribute as a boolean. If there is no value set for the attribute or if the attribute can not be read as a boolean, false will be returned.

Parameters:
name - The name of the attribute to get
Returns:
The value of attribute or false if no value is set for the attribute or the value cannot be interpreted as a boolean.

setBooleanAttribute

void setBooleanAttribute(String name,
                         boolean value)
Sets the attribute of the given name to the given boolean value.

Parameters:
name - The name of the attribute to set.
value - The value to set the attribute to

removeAttribute

void removeAttribute(String name)
Unsets any attribute with the given name.

Parameters:
name - The name of the attribute to remove

hasAttribute

boolean hasAttribute(String name)
Checks if the given attribute is present.

Parameters:
name - Name of the attribute to check for
Returns:
True if the given attribute is present, false otherwise.

getAttributeNames

Iterable<String> getAttributeNames()
Returns an Iterable of attribute names.

Returns:
Iterable of attribute names

recordGuardAction

void recordGuardAction(Engine engine,
                       GuardAction action)
A NodeToken is evaluated by the Node.guard(Engine, NodeToken) method. recordGuardAction will be called by the engine to record the result of the guard.

Parameters:
engine - The Engine being used to execute the associated Process.
action - The GuardAction taken with this NodeToken.
See Also:
Node.guard(Engine, NodeToken)

getGuardAction

GuardAction getGuardAction()
Returns the GuardAction that was returned from the Node guard called on this token or null if the guard has not completed or been called.

Returns:
The result of the Node guard called on this token, or null if the guard has not completed or been called.
